description: Identifier of the saved query/report that this computed field belongs to, used to group computed fields under the same query configuration.
Alias or display name for the computed field as it will appear in query results and reports.
Formula or SQL snippet used to compute the field's value at runtime; likely stored as executable SQL; confirm with SME.
Data type of the computed field's output (e.g., numeric, currency, string), used to format results and validate expressions.
Username or system account that created the computed field configuration for the query.
Date and time the computed field configuration was created (UTC unless otherwise noted).
Username or system account that last modified the computed field configuration.
Date and time the computed field configuration was last modified (UTC unless otherwise noted).
